task.title: View Edges
task.shortdesc: Edges types are displayed both in the Graph and in the Commands Tab.

context.p: When a user hovers overtop of a Edge, a label appears indicating the Edge type and the number of connections in this category.
Edge types can also be viewed in the Commands Tab. The Edges of Selected Nodes bin contains the Edge types associated with any nodes in a Selected state.
context.note: Clicking on an Edge type will drag those Selected nodes into the central Graph.
